org.objectstyle.cayenne.validation
Class BeanValidationFailure

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.validation.SimpleValidationFailure
        |
        +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.validation.BeanValidationFailure
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, ValidationFailure
public class BeanValidationFailure
extends SimpleValidationFailure

ValidationFailure implementation that described a failure of a single named property of a Java Bean object.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Fabricio Voznika, Andrei Adamchik
See Also:
